item.title: Accessibility and Accommodations FAQ
item.dc:creator: Tiffani LeClair
item.description:
NWEA is committed to making our products accessible for all students. Various accommodations and accessibility features for MAP Growth assessments ensure that all students can benefit from assessment activities. Download

The post Accessibility and Accommodations FAQ appeared first on NWEA.
item.content:encoded:
NWEA is committed to making our products accessible for all students. Various accommodations and accessibility features for MAP Growth assessments ensure that all students can benefit from assessment activities. Download the FAQ for full details on accommodations and accessibility features available in our products.

The post Accessibility and Accommodations FAQ appeared first on NWEA.
